entities.name: zabini
entities.description: Zabini is a person who is angry and smashing the sliding door into Harry's foot. He is described as 'angrily' and his actions are aggressive.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is being attacked by Zabini with the sliding door. He is able to defend himself and push the door open.

entities.name: gregory goyle
entities.description: Goyle is a person who is snarling at Zabini, drawing attention away from Harry's exposed feet. He is described as 'snarling' and his actions are aggressive.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a person who is sniggering at Harry's exposed feet. He is described as 'sniggering' and his actions are mocking.

entities.name: vincent crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is a person who returns to his comic after the commotion dies down. He is described as 'returning' and his actions are calm.

entities.name: cloak
entities.description: The Cloak is an object that Harry is wearing, which flaps around his feet and ankles. It is described as 'flapping' and its actions are accidental.

entities.name: trainer
entities.description: Harry's trainer is an object that is visible to Malfoy, who follows it with his eyes. It is described as 'whipping upwards' and its actions are accidental.

relationships.description: Zabini attacks Harry with the sliding door, smashing it into his foot. This is described as 'angrily' and Zabini's actions are aggressive.
Harry defends himself against Zabini's attack by pushing the door open. This is described as 'hard' and Harry's actions are defensive.
Goyle snarls at Zabini, drawing attention away from Harry's exposed feet. This is described as 'snarling' and Goyle's actions are aggressive.
Malfoy sniggers at Harry's exposed feet, following his trainer with his eyes. This is described as 'sniggering' and Malfoy's actions are mocking.
